{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.07552v1", "title": "Uniqueness of supercritical Gaussian multiplicative chaos", "summary": "We show that, for general convolution approximations to a large class of
log-correlated Gaussian fields, the properly normalised supercritical Gaussian
multiplicative chaos measures converge stably to a nontrivial limit. This limit
depends on the choice of regularisation only through a multiplicative constant
and can be characterised as an integrated atomic measure with a random
intensity expressed in terms of the critical Gaussian multiplicative chaos.", "main_category": "math.PR", "categories": "math.PR,math-ph,math.MP", "published": "2025-04-10T08:29:12Z"}
